name: PHASEReverbPreset
desc: The manner in which PHASE diffuses resonating sound.

items.name: case cathedral
items.desc: A resonation that simulates the experience of hearing a sound in a cathedral.

items.name: case largeChamber
items.desc: A resonation that simulates the experience of hearing a sound in a large chamber with specific dimensions.

items.name: case largeHall
items.desc: A resonation that simulates the experience of hearing a sound in a large hall with specific dimensions.

items.name: case largeHall2
items.desc: A resonation that simulates the experience of hearing a sound in one kind of large hall with specific dimensions.

items.name: case largeRoom
items.desc: A resonation that simulates the experience of hearing a sound in a large room with specific dimensions.

items.name: case largeRoom2
items.desc: A resonation that simulates the experience of hearing a sound in one kind of large room with specific dimensions.

items.name: case mediumChamber
items.desc: A resonation that simulates the experience of hearing a sound in a medium-size chamber with specific dimensions.

items.name: case mediumHall
items.desc: A resonation that simulates the experience of hearing a sound in a medium-size hall with specific dimensions.

items.name: case mediumHall2
items.desc: A resonation that simulates the experience of hearing a sound in one kind of medium-size hall with specific dimensions.

items.name: case mediumHall3
items.desc: A resonation that simulates the experience of hearing a sound in another kind of medium-size hall with specific dimensions.

items.name: case mediumRoom
items.desc: A resonation that simulates the experience of hearing a sound in a medium-size room with specific dimensions.

items.name: case none
items.desc: An option that adds no reverberation to a sound.

items.name: case smallRoom
items.desc: A resonation that simulates the experience of hearing a sound in a small room with specific dimensions.
